column5: Hi Y'all,   Seems at least 2 of us in the family like ice fishing.      I THINK BERT COULD USE THUMBS!  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i263.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid263.photobucket.com/albums/ii158/vishuscirquel/bertVminnows.flv">
Yep.... looks like Bert's a real trooper     Too funny Simon

Thanks for making my day Simon, about the only way that could have been better would have been if Bert went through the ice at the end .  I think this one will be in the running for best ice fishing video of the day.  Thanks
We were kinda waiting to throw him the PFD...lol...it would've been classic eh?   Cats look soooo funny soaked through.
Enjoyed that. Thx for sharing. Teach Bert how to run the auger and you have got a fishing buddy for life!!!
